data.title: Pedro Henrique of Orléans
data.meta_description: Prince Pedro Henrique of Orléans-Braganza, nicknamed The Expected Prince was the eldest son of Prince Luís of Orléans-Braganza and Princess Maria di Grazia of Bourbon-Two Sicilies, and head of the Vassouras branch of the Imperial House of Brazil from 1921 until his death in 1981.
